column2: "EWURADZE
column3: kaa dza aba hɛn do: Hwɛ

column2: "Wɔadan hɛn egyapadze ama ahɔho
"Yɛayɛ enyisaba na ngyanka
"Yeetua sika anom hɛnankasa hɛn nsu; Wɔdze hɛn nyena atɔn hɛn."
"Hɛn etsiwfo dze hɛn kɔn ekyir: Yɛaberɛ
"Yɛdze hɛn nsa ama Egyptfo
"Hɛn egyanom ayɛ bɔn
column3: na wonnyi hɔ; Na hɛn dze

column2: "Nkowaa dzi hɛn do tum: Obi nnyi hɔ a ɔgye hɛn fi hɔn nsamu."
"Hɛn nkwa kitsakitsa hɛn nsamu na yɛkɛfa hɛn edziban
column3: wɔ sar do afona no ntsi."

column2: "Hɛn wer ahyew tumm dɛ fononoo wɔ ɔkɔm ne gyaframee ntsi."
"Woguu Zion mbaa enyim ase
"Wɔkyekyeer mbapɔmba nsa sensɛnee: Wɔannhwɛ mpanyimfo enyim emmbu hɔn bi."
"Hɔn mberantsɛ soaa ewuyambo
column3: Na mbofra fintsiwii wɔ nyena nkyekyeree ase."

column2: "Mpanyimfo egyaa abobotsen ano ba
"Hɛn akoma n’enyigye abɔ adze; Hɛn asaw adan nkɔmbɔdzi."
"Abɔtsir no efi hɛn tsir egu: Yendue
"Iyi ntsi na hɛn akoma atɔ bitsi; Ndzɛmba yinom ntsi na hɛn enyiwa ayɛ kusukusu;"
"Zion bepɔw a ayɛ amamfo ntsi; Nsɔ nenam do."
"EWURADZE
column3: ɔwoara na etse hɔ daa; W’ahengua fir ebusuasantsen kodu ebusuasantsen."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na wo werɛ fir hɛn daa
column3: Na epa hɛn mber tsentsen dɛm yi?"

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: san hɛn bra wo nkyɛn na yɛbɛsan; Yɛ hɛn nda fofor dɛ tsetse dze no
column6: na wo bo efuw hɛn dodoodow?"
